bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zhi chuang 痔瘡 , piles sores, with bugs/worms inside. The anus is moist and festers. In many cases erosion leads to punctuation with holes and the generation of fistulae. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 24: 以紙裹莨菪根，煻火燒熟，以蜜塗納下部中， 一切 蟲痔皆愈 , “Wrap a lang dang root in paper, roast in a pit fire until done, smear with honey and insert from below. All types of bug piles will be cured”.
